randomWildEncounters.name: Route 1
randomWildEncounters.description: While walking along Route 1, you come across wild Pokémon

randomWildEncounters.name: Route 22
randomWildEncounters.description: After arriving in Viridian City, you decide to go to Route 22 to fight the pokemon league. However, several wild pokemon attack you

randomWildEncounters.name: Route 2
randomWildEncounters.description: To get your first badge, you head to Pewter City. Several wild Pokemon attack you on Route 2

randomWildEncounters.name: Viridian Forest
randomWildEncounters.description: To reach Pewter City, you pass through Viridian Forest. You are attacked by several bug types Pokemon.

randomWildEncounters.name: Mt. Moon 2
randomWildEncounters.description: You are still trying to get out of this cave but wild pokemon are attacking you

randomWildEncounters.name: Route 4
randomWildEncounters.description: You are finally out of the cave and you see Cerulean City in the distance. You just have to cross some tall grass and hope you don't run into any wild pokemon.

randomWildEncounters.name: Route 5
randomWildEncounters.description: After getting your second badge, you head to the nearest gym: the one in Saffron City

randomWildEncounters.name: Route 6
randomWildEncounters.description: Guards are blocking your access to Saffron City. You decide to go through an underground and challenge the gym in the city south of Saffron City.

randomWildEncounters.name: Diglett's Cave
randomWildEncounters.description: You receive a call from Professor Oak that a powerful pokemon has appeared in Diglett's cave. You go there to find out more.

randomWildEncounters.name: Rock Tunnel B1F
randomWildEncounters.description: You enter the B1F and you come across several wild Pokemon.

randomWildEncounters.name: Route 10
randomWildEncounters.description: You come out of the Rock Tunnel and see the Pokemon Tower of Lavanville on the horizon.

randomWildEncounters.name: Pokemon Tower
randomWildEncounters.description: After beating Jackson, you can finally catch some ghost types Pokemon.

randomWildEncounters.name: Route 7
randomWildEncounters.description: A guard blocks your access to Saffron City, so you take an underground passage that leads you to Route 7.

randomWildEncounters.name: Route 18
randomWildEncounters.description: You are almost in Fuchsia City, there are some wild Pokemon on your way

randomWildEncounters.name: Safari Zone
randomWildEncounters.description: Welcome to the Safari Zone! This parks features many wild Pokemon! Try to catch as many as you can!

randomWildEncounters.name: Route 15
randomWildEncounters.description: After obtaining your fifth badge, you head to the next gym which is located in Saffron City.

randomWildEncounters.name: Route 12
randomWildEncounters.description: On Route 12, a fisherman offers you a fishing rod to find Pokemon water types. Therefore, you decide to use it.

randomWildEncounters.name: Sea Route 19
randomWildEncounters.description: Before leaving Safrania, one of the Silph Co scientists has given you a Lapras to cross Sea Route 19 at the south of Fuschia City.

randomWildEncounters.name: Seafoam Islands
randomWildEncounters.description: To reach Cinnabar Islands, you have to cross Seafoam Islands. Once in the cave, you feel the presence of a powerful pokemon.

randomWildEncounters.name: Pokemon Mansion
randomWildEncounters.description: Once you arrive at Cinnabar Island, you head to Cinnabar Gym but the door is locked but there is a note on that door indicating that the key is in the Pokemon Mansion.

randomWildEncounters.name: Victory Road
randomWildEncounters.description: Having shown your 8 badges to the guard, you enter the Victory Road, the last step before the Pokemon League

randomWildEncounters.name: Power Plant
randomWildEncounters.description: After defeating the Pokemon League, Professor Oak sends you to the abandoned Power Plant on Route 10 because something strange is happening with the wild Pokemon there.

randomWildEncounters.name: VS Electrodes
randomWildEncounters.description: You advance in the Power Plant and several powerful Electrodes attack you.

randomWildEncounters.name: Route 28
randomWildEncounters.description: You receive a letter from the Sinnoh region's champion who wants to battle you on the top of Mt Silver. You decide to go there to face her.

randomWildEncounters.name: Mt Silver
randomWildEncounters.description: You finally reach Mt. Silver and you come across several wild Pokemon.

randomWildEncounters.name: Cerulean Cave
randomWildEncounters.description: After defeating Cynthia, you visit Professor Oak and he informs you that your rival Jackson has gone to Cerulean Cave and encountered the most powerful Pokemon he has ever seen. He ran away because his Pokemon were defeated by this creature. Be careful!

randomWildEncounters.name: Cerulean Cave 1F
randomWildEncounters.description: Pokemon in this cave are very powerful. Keep it up!

randomWildEncounters.name: Cerulean Cave B1F
randomWildEncounters.description: You find a ladder that takes you into the depths of the cave. You feel the presence of the powerful Pokemon.

trainerBattles.name: VS Rival
trainerBattles.description: After receiving your first pokemon, your rival challenges you to show you how powerful he is
trainerBattles.startDialog: Hey you, you want to be a pokemon trainer, so show me what you got!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: It's beginner's luck. Next time, I'll crush you with my Tyrogue.
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Don't even think about leaving Pallet Town...

trainerBattles.name: VS Rival 2
trainerBattles.description: Having no badge, the guard does not let you enter the Victory Road. However, you come across your rival
trainerBattles.startDialog: Hey, you got kicked out of the Victory Road too.  I was ready to blow them away with my Tyrogue. For that matter, I'm going to blow you away.
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: You just got lucky.
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Well done Tyrogue

trainerBattles.name: VS Bug Catcher
trainerBattles.description: You finally find the exit of Viridian Forest but a trainer challenges you
trainerBattles.startDialog: If you want to leave Viridian Forest, you'll have to fight me!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: I'm going to catch stronger bug types Pokemon
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Bugs are the strongest

trainerBattles.name: Pewter Gym
trainerBattles.description: You have arrived in Pewter City and are going straight to the gym. However, you can't face the gym leader yet.
trainerBattles.startDialog: Stop right there, kid! It's way too early for you to take on Brock
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: You're pretty good, but not as good as Brock!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: I warned you

trainerBattles.name: Route 3
trainerBattles.description: After obtaining your first badge, you go to Route 3 where several trainers want to battle
trainerBattles.startDialog: Hi! I like shorts! They're comfy and easy to wear!

trainerBattles.name: Mt. Moon
trainerBattles.description: After crossing Route 3, you enter a cave to reach Cerulean City.
trainerBattles.startDialog: Did you come to explore too?
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Kids like you shouldn't be here!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Kids like you shouldn't be here!

trainerBattles.name: VS Team Rocket
trainerBattles.description: Suspicious men are in the cave. One of them is heading towards you.
trainerBattles.startDialog: We, Team Rocket, are Pokemon gangsters
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: I blew it!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: You can't beat Team Rocket!

trainerBattles.name: VS Rival 3
trainerBattles.description: You have finally arrived in Cerulean City but you come across Jackson.
trainerBattles.startDialog: Hey, you only got one badge. I've already beaten the gym here. Come on, show me what you got
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Hey! Take it easy! You won already!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: You're no match for my genius!

trainerBattles.name: Route 24
trainerBattles.description: You have decide to train before challenging the Cerulean Gym so you go to Route 24
trainerBattles.startDialog: This is NUGGET BRIDGE! Do you have what it takes to beat us 5 trainers?
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: With your ability, you could become a top leader in TEAM ROCKET!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Try again

trainerBattles.name: Cerulean Gym
trainerBattles.description: After facing the trainers on the bridge, you finally feel ready to take on the Cerulean gym.
trainerBattles.startDialog: You want to fight Misty, you'll have to beat me first.
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Misty won't lose to someone like you!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Guess you'll never beat Misty

trainerBattles.name: Route 6
trainerBattles.description: Guards are blocking your access to Saffron City. You decide to go through an underground and challenge the gym in the city south of Saffron City.
trainerBattles.startDialog: I've never seen you around! Are you good?
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: I like bugs, so I'm going back to VIRIDIAN FOREST
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: I'm surprised, you look pretty tough

trainerBattles.name: Vermilion Gym
trainerBattles.description: You have arrived in Vermilion City and you are going to challenge the gym immediately. As usual, you will have to defeat the guard before challenging the gym leader.
trainerBattles.startDialog: This is no place for kids!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Watch out for Lt. Surge's electric Pokemon
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: I told you...

trainerBattles.name: Route 9
trainerBattles.description: After defeating Dugtrio, Professor Oak advises you to go to Lavender Town to catch some ghost types Pokemon. So you go to Route 9 to the east of Cerulean City
trainerBattles.startDialog: Hahahaha! Come on, dude!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Use a flashlight to cross the Rock Tunnel
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: You're not strong enough to get through the Rock Tunnel

trainerBattles.name: Rock Tunner 1F
trainerBattles.description: You enter Rock Tunnel but it is so dark that you can't  see anything. So you use a flashlight and see several trainers ready to battle you.
trainerBattles.startDialog: This tunnel goes a long way, kid!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Whew! I'm all sweaty now!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: I play hard!

trainerBattles.name: VS Rival 4
trainerBattles.description: You have arrived in Lavender Town and you are going to the Pokemon Tower. Once inside, you come across Jackson.
trainerBattles.startDialog: You again! I've gotten much stronger since our last fight let me show you.
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: I can't believe it!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: I knew I would win this time

trainerBattles.name: VS Team Rocket
trainerBattles.description: On the top floor of the Pokemon Tower, you come across Team Rocket brutalizing an old man.
trainerBattles.startDialog: What do you want? Why are you here?
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: I give up!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: You're not saving anyone, kid!

trainerBattles.name: Route 8
trainerBattles.description: After saving the old man from Team Rocket, he gives you a flute to wake up a Pokemon on Route 16. Therefore, you go west from Lavender Town to wake up this Pokemon
trainerBattles.startDialog: School is fun, but so are POKEMON.
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Saffron's gate keeper won't let us through. He's so mean!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: You need a strategy to win at this!

trainerBattles.name: Celadon Gym
trainerBattles.description: You have arrived in Celadon City and are about to face the gym.
trainerBattles.startDialog: Hey! You are not allowed in here!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Aah! I hope Erika wipes you out!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Oh! Splendid!

trainerBattles.name: Route 17
trainerBattles.description: You are walking on Route 17 and a biker comes to challenge you.
trainerBattles.startDialog: What do you want, kiddo?
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: I could belly-bump you outta here!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Whew! Good workout!

trainerBattles.name: Fuschia Gym
trainerBattles.description: You have arrived in Fuschia City and are about to face the gym.
trainerBattles.startDialog: Let's see you beat my special techniques!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: I will keep on training under Koga, my ninja master!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: I like poison and sleep techniques, as they linger after battle!

trainerBattles.name: Route 14
trainerBattles.description: You continue your way to Saffron City and several trainers stand in your way.
trainerBattles.startDialog: My bird Pokemon should be ready for battle
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: It's cool you made your Pokemon so strong! Might is right!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Get lost!

trainerBattles.name: Route 13
trainerBattles.description: You continue your way to Saffron City and several trainers stand in your way.
trainerBattles.startDialog: I always go with bird Pokemon!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Wow! You totally won!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: It's over already?

trainerBattles.name: Silph Co
trainerBattles.description: You arrive in Saffron City and Team Rocket has invaded the city. You learn that the boss of the organization is on the top floor of the Silph Co. building. You go there to stop him.
trainerBattles.startDialog: You broke into our operation?
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: You're not going to get away with this, brat!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: It's not smart to pick a fight with TEAM ROCKET

trainerBattles.name: VS Rival 5
trainerBattles.description: Still in the Silph Co building, you come across Jackson.
trainerBattles.startDialog: I thought you would show up again if I waited here! I guess Team Rocket slowed you down! I want to see what you're made of.
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: You're ready to beat the boss of Team Rocket!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: I knew I would win this time

trainerBattles.name: VS Archer
trainerBattles.description: You finally reach the top floor and a Team Rocket Executive is standing in front of the door of the room where the boss is.
trainerBattles.startDialog: So you're fool enough to get in our way, is that it?
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Forgive me, Giovanni... For me to be defeated by a simple child...
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: I won't allow you to interfere with our plans!

trainerBattles.name: VS Giovanni
trainerBattles.description: You enter the room where the boss is and you see him pressuring the chief of the Silph Co. to work for him.
trainerBattles.startDialog: So, you defeated Archer. I must say, I am impressed you got here!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: You ruined our plans for Silph! But, Team Rocket will never fall!! Never forget that all Pokémon exist for Team Rocket! I must go, but I shall return!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: You failed as soon as you challenged me, Trainer.

trainerBattles.name: Fighting Dojo
trainerBattles.description: Before challenging the saffron gym, you decide to train to the fighting dojo
trainerBattles.startDialog: I am the KARATE MASTER! I am the LEADER here!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Indeed, I have lost! But, I beseech you, do not take our emblem as your trophy! In return, I will give you a prized fighting Pokemon: Tyrogue
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: You need to train more!

trainerBattles.name: Saffron Gym
trainerBattles.description: After defeating Giovanni, you go to the gym to battle the gym leader.
trainerBattles.startDialog: Sabrina is young, but she's also our LEADER! You won't reach her easily!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: I never foresaw this!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: That's right! I used telepathy to read your mind!

trainerBattles.name: Sea Route 20
trainerBattles.description: You are now heading to Cinnabar Island but there are Pokemon trainers in the water.
trainerBattles.startDialog: Why are you riding a Pokemon? Can't you swim?
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: There's a huge cavern underneath this island.
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Now I'm ready for a swim!

trainerBattles.name: Cinnabar Gym
trainerBattles.description: After finding the key to the gym, you leave the mansion and head straight for the gym.
trainerBattles.startDialog: You can't win! I have studied Pokemon totally!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: My theories are too complicated for you!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: I will continue my studies...

trainerBattles.name: Sea Route 21
trainerBattles.description: After obtaining your seventh badge, you decide to go to Viridian City to get your last badge.
trainerBattles.startDialog: Ahh! Feel the sun and the wind!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: I lost!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: The sea cleanses my body and my soul!

trainerBattles.name: VS Professor Oak
trainerBattles.description: You arrive in Pallet Town and visit Professor Oak
trainerBattles.startDialog: Hello, it's been a long time! I'd like to show you an item from the Kalos region that can increase the strength of your Pokemon.
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Here, it's yours! Try using it on the Pokemon I gave you when you started your journey! There are many more Pokémon capable of Mega Evolution
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: I will give this item to you if you can defeat me.

trainerBattles.name: Viridian Gym
trainerBattles.description: You are back in Viridian City, it's time to get your last badge.
trainerBattles.startDialog: This gym was closed for a long time, but now our leader is back!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Do you know the identity of our gym leader?
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Pokemon League? You? Don't get cocky!

trainerBattles.name: VS Giovanni 2
trainerBattles.description: After defeating the guards, you go to the gym leader and you notice that it's Giovanni, the boss of Team Rocket!
trainerBattles.startDialog: This is my hideout! I planned to resurrect TEAM ROCKET here! But, you have caught me again! So be it! This time, I'm not holding back!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: No, this is not over.  But nothing will prepare you for my secret weapon
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Fwahahaha! You got defeated by me, Giovanni, the greatest trainer!

trainerBattles.name: VS ???
trainerBattles.description: Giovanni has called his secret weapon which looks like an armored Pokémon
trainerBattles.startDialog: Go, my secret weapon!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: That was a truly intense fight! You have won! As proof, here is the Earth Badge. Having lost, I cannot face my underlings! TEAM ROCKET is finished forever!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Fwahahaha! You got defeated by me, Giovanni, the greatest trainer!

trainerBattles.name: Trainer House
trainerBattles.description: You heard that a very powerful trainer is looking for challengers in Viridian City's Trainer House. You decide to go there
trainerBattles.startDialog: Welcome to the trainer house, let's battle!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Nice battle!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: We can have a rematch whenever you want!

trainerBattles.name: VS Rival 6
trainerBattles.description: Now that you have 8 badges, you head for the Victory Road. However, on Route 22, you run into Jackson.
trainerBattles.startDialog: What a surprise to see you here! So you're going to the Pokemon League? You collected all the badges too? That's cool! Then I'll whip you as a warm up for Pokemon League!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: I don't believe it! Well, I'm off to the Pokemon League.
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: That's your best? You're nowhere near as good as me, pal! Go train some more! You loser!

trainerBattles.name: Victory Road 2
trainerBattles.description: Still in Victory Road, there are several trainers in your path. Take them down to get to the Pokemon League
trainerBattles.startDialog: Only the chosen can pass here!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: By fighting tough battles, you get stronger!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: You showed me just how good I was!

trainerBattles.name: VS Steven Stone
trainerBattles.description: After hearing about your victory in the league, a trainer invites you to Pewter City for a
trainerBattles.startDialog: Hi! My name is Steven. The Champion from the Hoenn region. I'm interested in rare Stones, so I travel here and there. Let's battle!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: You are a truly noble Pokémon Trainer!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: When it comes down to it, I'm still the strongest!

trainerBattles.name: VS Cynthia
trainerBattles.description: At the top of Mt. Silver, you come across the champion of the Sinnoh region.
trainerBattles.startDialog: When you are facing a Trainer in battle, you can learn everything about them. What Pokémon they have. What moves they've taught. There's no need for words then.
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: That was excellent. Truly, an outstanding battle. You gave the support your Pokémon needed to maximize their power. And you guided them with certainty to secure victory.
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: What's necessary to become stronger? I think it's important to never lose your love of Pokémon.

trainerBattles.name: VS Game Developer
trainerBattles.description: At the end of your adventure, a trainer comes to challenge you... And it's me: the developer of this game!
trainerBattles.startDialog: Hi, I am the game developer. Since you've come so far, I wanted to see how strong you are!
trainerBattles.endDialogWin: Thank you for playing my game!
trainerBattles.endDialogLoose: Too bad, you were so close to finishing my game!

bossBattles.name: Vs Dugtrio
bossBattles.description: You finally find the powerful Pokémon that Professor Oak tells you about. It is a wild Dugtrio. It attacks you by shaking the ground. Stop it before it's too late.

bossBattles.name: Vs Marowak
bossBattles.description: As you advance through the Pokémon Tower, you come across a Marowak that looks extremely powerful. Watch out, it's attacking you!

bossBattles.name: Vs Snorlax
bossBattles.description: After getting your fourth badge, you go to Route 16 and come across the sleeping Pokemon. You wake him up with the flute that the old man gave you and it gets really angry!

bossBattles.name: Vs Articuno
bossBattles.description: In the depths of Seafoam Island, you come across a powerful looking bird. Upon closer inspection, you notice that it is the legendary bird Articuno!

bossBattles.name: Vs Moltres
bossBattles.description: You finally see the exit of Victory Road but you feel the presence of a powerful Pokemon near you. You head into a really hot room near the exit and come across the legendary bird Moltres.

bossBattles.name: Vs Zapdos
bossBattles.description: At the very bottom of the Power Plant, you come across the legendary bird Zapdos and he attacks you!

bossBattles.name: Vs Tyranitar
bossBattles.description: You can see the exit to the top of Mt Silver. However, a very powerful looking Tyranitar attacks you!

bossBattles.name: Vs Mewtwo
bossBattles.description: You finally come across the powerful Pokemon. It seems to want to fight you! Show him what you can do!

bossBattles.name: Vs Mega Mewtwo
bossBattles.description: Mewtwo is about to faint but he gets up and shows you his true power. Give it all you've got and use the inventive strategies that got you this far!

leaderBattles.name: VS Brock
leaderBattles.description: After defeating the guard, you can finally face the gym leader!
leaderBattles.title: Gym Leader Brock
leaderBattles.startDialog1: I am Brock, the gym leader of Pewter City ! I believe in the great power of rock! That's why my Pokémon are of the Rock type! Do you still want to fight with me?  All right!
leaderBattles.startDialog2: You sure look different from when we first met! I have a request for you, since you're now the Pokémon League Champion.  Allow me to show you the true rock-hard strength of my Pokémon!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin1: I took you for granted, and so I lost. As proof of your victory, I confer on you this...the official Pokémon League Boulder Badge.
leaderBattles.endDialogWin2: I knew you were strong, but this...
leaderBattles.endDialogLoose: The best offense is a good defense! That's my way of doing things!

leaderBattles.name: VS Misty
leaderBattles.description: As you have defeated the guard, you can finally face Misty, the gym leader of Cerulean City.
leaderBattles.title: Gym Leader Misty
leaderBattles.startDialog1: Hi, you're a new face! Only those Trainers who have a policy about Pokémon can turn pro. What is your approach when you catch and train Pokémon? My policy is an all out offensive with Water-type Pokémon!
leaderBattles.startDialog2: I can't believe you became the Pokemon League Champion. You've gotten so strong that I just absolutely have to battle you again!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin1: You really are good... I'll admit that you are skilled... Here you go. It's the Cascade Badge.
leaderBattles.endDialogLoose: See! This is the Water-type toughness I was talking about!

leaderBattles.name: VS Lt. Surge
leaderBattles.description: As you have defeated the guard, you can finally face Lt. Surge, the gym leader of Vermilion City.
leaderBattles.title: Gym Leader Lt. Surge
leaderBattles.startDialog1: Hey, kid! What do you think you're doing here? You won't live long in combat! That's for sure!
leaderBattles.startDialog2: Hey there, kid! Pretty shocking you made it through the Pokémon League! How about you show me what kind of Pokémon you've raised!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin1: Whoa! You're the real deal, kid! Fine then, take the Thunder Badge.

leaderBattles.name: VS Erika
leaderBattles.description: After beating the guard, you go to the gym leader to challenge her.
leaderBattles.title: Gym Leader Erika
leaderBattles.startDialog1: Welcome. My name is Erika. I am the Gym Leader of the Celadon Gym. I am a student of the art of flower arranging. My Pokémon are all of the Grass type. Did you perhaps wish to challenge me? Very well but I shall not lose
leaderBattles.startDialog2: How are you? Good to see you again!  A battle? Right now? But of course. I graciously accept.
leaderBattles.endDialogWin1: Oh! I concede defeat. You are remarkably strong. I must confer on you the Rainbow Badge
leaderBattles.endDialogWin2: Oh! It appears it is my loss.
leaderBattles.endDialogLoose: I thank you for your demonstration

leaderBattles.name: VS Koga
leaderBattles.description: After beating the guard, you go to the gym leader to challenge him.
leaderBattles.title: Gym Leader Koga
leaderBattles.startDialog1: A mere child like you dares to challenge me? Very well, I shall show you true terror as a ninja master!
leaderBattles.startDialog2: It seems we are fated to meet once again. I was just thinking that I wanted to test my newly refined sinister techniques in a battle that will end in your utter defeat!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin1: You have proven your worth! Take a Soul Badge!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin2: If I am not strong enough to defeat you now, there is but one thing to do. I must hone my skills.
leaderBattles.endDialogLoose: Have you learned to fear the techniques of the ninja?

leaderBattles.name: VS Sabrina
leaderBattles.description: After defeating the guards, you can finally battle against the gym leader.
leaderBattles.title: Gym Leader Sabrina
leaderBattles.startDialog1: I had a vision of your arrival! I have had psychic powers since I was a child. I dislike battling, but if you wish, I will show you my powers!
leaderBattles.startDialog2: I knew you'd come! I had a feeling. But I intentionally didn't look to see who will win out battle. Let's find out together!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin1: Your power... It far exceeds what I foresaw... Maybe it isn't possible to fully predict what the future holds. OK, you win. You earned yourself the Marsh Badge.
leaderBattles.endDialogWin2: There was once a time when I was shocked that I lost to you. That feeling is gone now. It's been replaced with a desire to grow strong and live freely, as you do.

leaderBattles.name: VS Blaine
leaderBattles.description: After defeating the guard, you go to the gym leader.
leaderBattles.title: Gym Leader Blaine
leaderBattles.startDialog1: Hi! I'm Blaine! I am the Leader of Cinnabar Gym! My fiery Pokémon will incinerate all challengers!
leaderBattles.startDialog2: Well done, returning here to my Gym! Since you came all this way, we should have a battle!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin1: I have burned down to nothing! Not even ashes remain! You have earned the Volcano Badge.
leaderBattles.endDialogWin2: I have burned down to nothing! Not even ashes remain!

leaderBattles.name: VS Lorelei
leaderBattles.title: Elite 4 Lorelei
leaderBattles.startDialog1: Welcome to the Pokemon League! I am Lorelei of the Elite Four! No one can best me when it comes to icy Pokemon. Are you ready?
leaderBattles.endDialogWin1: You're better than I thought! Go on ahead! You only got a taste of Pokemon League power!
leaderBattles.startDialog2: Welcome to the Pokemon League! I am Lorelei of the Elite Four! No one can best me when it comes to icy Pokemon. Are you ready?
leaderBattles.endDialogWin2: You're better than I thought! Go on ahead! You only got a taste of Pokemon League power!
leaderBattles.endDialogLoose: You're no match against my icy Pokemon!

leaderBattles.name: VS Bruno
leaderBattles.title: Elite 4 Bruno
leaderBattles.startDialog1: I am Bruno of the Elite Four! Through rigorous training, people and Pokémon can become stronger without limit. I've lived and trained with my fighting Pokémon!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin1: My job is done! Go face your next challenge!
leaderBattles.startDialog2: I am Bruno of the Elite Four! Through rigorous training, people and Pokémon can become stronger without limit. I've lived and trained with my fighting Pokémon!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin2: My job is done! Go face your next challenge!

leaderBattles.name: VS Agatha
leaderBattles.title: Elite 4 Agatha
leaderBattles.startDialog1: I am Agatha of the Elite Four. Let me show you how a real trainer battles!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin1: You win! I have nothing else to say. Run along now, child!
leaderBattles.startDialog2: I am Agatha of the Elite Four. Let me show you how a real trainer battles!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin2: You win! I have nothing else to say. Run along now, child!
leaderBattles.endDialogLoose: That's how a proper battle's done!

leaderBattles.name: VS Lance
leaderBattles.title: Elite 4 Lance
leaderBattles.startDialog1: Ah! I heard about you! I lead the Elite Four! You can call me Lance the dragon trainer! Well, are you ready to lose? Your League challenge ends with me
leaderBattles.endDialogWin1: I still can't believe my dragons lost to you! You're now the Pokémon League Champion! Or, you would have been, but you have one more challenge ahead. You have to face another trainer!
leaderBattles.startDialog2: Ah! I heard about you! I lead the Elite Four! You can call me Lance the dragon trainer! Well, are you ready to lose? Your League challenge ends with me
leaderBattles.endDialogWin2: I still can't believe my dragons lost to you! You're now the Pokémon League Champion! Or, you would have been, but you have one more challenge ahead. You have to face another trainer!
leaderBattles.endDialogLoose: I never give up, no matter what

leaderBattles.name: VS Champion
leaderBattles.title: Champion Jackson
leaderBattles.startDialog1: Hey! I was looking forward to seeing you! My rival should be strong to keep me sharp! I looked all over for powerful Pokemon and I assembled a team that would beat any Pokemon type! And now! I'm the Pokemon League Champion! Do you know what that means? I'll tell you! I am the most powerful trainer in the world!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin1: NO! That can't be! You beat my best! After all that work to become the champion? My reign is over already? It's not fair!
leaderBattles.startDialog2: Hey! I was looking forward to seeing you! My rival should be strong to keep me sharp! I looked all over for powerful Pokemon and I assembled a team that would beat any Pokemon type! And now! I'm the Pokemon League Champion! Do you know what that means? I'll tell you! I am the most powerful trainer in the world!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin2: NO! That can't be! You beat my best! After all that work to become the champion? My reign is over already? It's not fair!
leaderBattles.endDialogLoose: Hahah, this is so great! No one can defeat me!

leaderBattles.name: VS Palmer
leaderBattles.description: As you keep winning in the Battle Tower, you are going to face the leader of the Battle Tower.
leaderBattles.title: Tower Tycoon Palmer
leaderBattles.startDialog1: Hi! My name's Palmer. Show me the bond you've built with your Pokemon. Show me what you've learned through battles with Trainers!
leaderBattles.startDialog2: So, you've come this so far! As the Tower Tycoon, I'll have to give you my best effort. That's how the best Trainers show respect to each other.
leaderBattles.endDialogWin1: Bravo! I imagine many great Trainers will come to challenge me as you have just done. You will become even more skilled. Keep battling Trainers from around the world!
leaderBattles.endDialogWin2: I have no problem losing to a spectacular trainer like you!
leaderBattles.endDialogLoose: Ah, wonderful! That was fantastic! Do come again!
